item.description:
@redfrodude27 wrote:

NO it’s not saying anything. You’d do this:

if(itemUsed == 15341 && useWith == 15342 && useWith == 15343) { addItem(15330, 1); }

if(itemUsed == 15330 && useWith == 15331 && useWith == 15338) { addItem(15334, 1); }
Idk where to add though lol =]
O nvm add it to:

item.description:
@Zero_XL wrote:

i got this code to use item with item, and was wondering if this would work and…what would i put in the result, the item id? what i want done is, and not sure if it will work

if(itemUsed == 15341 && useWith == 15342 && useWith == 15343) { (15330) }

would that work? its godsword shards 1 2 and 3, used together to make godsword shard, after using it to do this…

if(itemUsed == 15330 && useWith == 15331 && useWith == 15338) { (15334) }

to give u a bandos godsword… would this code be correct? has anyone tested it?
where would i place these codes ?

for devolution source 7.0
